attributes.action: Zimbabwe must have hold elections soon, there needs to be new leadership
attributes.background: Zanu PF has to go! Zimbabwe needs new leadership in order to stop corruption. The current regime does not care for peoples human rights. There needs to be a party that caters for peoples needs and not their own needs

rejection.details:
The UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for the timetabling of elections in Zimbabwe.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to raise the issue of elections with the Zimbabwean government and/or the international community.
